entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
